name: bookhub
description: BookHub - A comprehensive book management application with enhanced security and CI/CD pipeline

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.changelog:check: echo 'Checking CHANGELOG.md for latest version...' && grep -A 10 '## \[Unreleased\]' CHANGELOG.md
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd backend && npm audit && cd ../frontend && npm audit
scripts.release:prepare: echo 'Preparing release...' && npm run test && npm run lint && npm run security:audit

author: Your Name
